title: High quality motorhomes for rent since 2003

overview.title1: Check out the brand new Challenger X250
overview.description1: The agility of a van and the comfort of a camper van. The best of both worlds. Previously, you had to choose between a vanand a camper van, but with the X-series, Challenger has created a middle category, combining the best of both worlds.
